principles.title: Quiet Presence
principles.description: We move without imposing sound, honoring the delicate balance of wildlife and guests.

principles.title: Minimal Footprint
principles.description: Structures are low-profile, and we manage waste through carry-in, carry-out protocols.

principles.title: Guided Reciprocity
principles.description: Every encounter is framed as listening, and we share what we learn with the broader community.

practices.title: Trail Care
practices.details: Seasonal maintenance is done by small crews who move quietly and plant native saplings when needed.

practices.title: Water Stewardship
practices.details: All water used onsite is filtered, and runoff is directed naturally back into the watershed.

practices.title: Community Sharing
practices.details: A portion of every tour supports conservation grants and cultural programs along the peninsula.

culturalProtocols.title: Cultural Sustainability & Ethics
bullets: SON maintains editorial control over stories shared on-site and online.
Cultural protocols guide what is shared and how it is shared.
Sacred knowledge is protected and not made public.
